description: ProcolCacao, founded 12 years ago, aims to empower Colombian cocoa producers by addressing market inequities and enhancing product quality. The initiative focuses on training farmers, ensuring traceability, and maintaining fair prices throughout the year. By fostering direct relationships with farmers and promoting sustainable practices, ProcolCacao strives to deliver high-quality cocoa products while improving the livelihoods of local producers and raising awareness about the nutritional benefits of pure cocoa.
name: ProcolCacao
